Start_Msg:
Welcome to Bookmarker Bot.
You can use me to save your bookmarks right on Telegram.
You can also add a channel and all your bookmark will be synchronized between me and the channel.
Menu_Msg: Send a link to add a new bookmark, or press one of the button below:
Help_Msg:
To start collecting your bookmarks, click /start and then send me a link.
To browse all your bookmarks press "Browse" in the menu. I'll show you a list with 3 bookmark each page.
To edit a bookmark press the title while you're browsing them.
If you find a bug send a screenshot to my developer, @danyspin97.
About_Msg:
I'm written in PHP and I've been developed using PhpBotFramework.
My creator is @danyspin97, contact him if you have any suggestions or question.
LanguageOption_Msg: Change bot's language by pressing one of the buttons below:
HashtagsExample_Msg:
List all hashtags one after another in a single message like this:
"#example #bot #hi"
EditUrl_Msg: Send the new url for this bookmark.
AddDescription_Msg: Send a description to add for this bookmark.
EditDescription_Msg: Change the description related to this bookmark.
AddHashtags_Msg: Add hashtags to attach for this bookmark.
UrlNotValid_Msg: The url sent is not valid. Please send a new link.
AddChannel_Msg:
To add a channel associated to me:
1->Add the bot to the channel administrators.
2->Forward me any message from the channel you want to add.
SendNewChannel_Msg: Forward a message from the new channel that will replace the old one.
ChannelAdded_Msg: The channel has been added. Now all your bookmarks has been sent in the channel you just added.
ChannelExplanation_Msg: All bookmarks will be synchronized between me and the channel so i'll edit and delete bookmarks there, as you do with me. The channel can be either private or public.
NotChannel_Msg: The message has not been forwarded by a channel. Try again by forwarding a message from the channel you want to add.
UserNotAdmin_Msg: You are not admin in the channel which the message has been forwarded by. Try again by forwarding a message from a channel in which you are administrator.
BotNotAdmin_Msg: You have not added the bot as administrator in the channel. Try again by forwarding a message from a channel in which the bot is administrator.
DeleteBookmarksWarning_Msg: Are you sure you want to delete all your bookmarks? This action cannot be undone.
DeleteBookmarkWarning_AnswerCallback: Click again to delete this bookmark.
